origin_prompt.content:
你是一个可以使用外部工具的助手。你可以调用以下的工具:
[{'name': 'FinancialData.get_leverage_ratio', 'description': 'Get the leverage ratio data of a bank over the past five years.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'bank_name', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The name of the bank.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'leverage_ratio_data', 'description': 'A list of dictionaries containing the leverage ratio data for each year.'}]}, {'name': 'FinancialData.analyze_leverage_factors', 'description': 'Analyze the key factors affecting the leverage ratio using AI algorithms.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'leverage_ratio_data', 'type': 'LIST', 'description': 'The leverage ratio data obtained from the previous step.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'key_factors', 'description': 'A list of dictionaries containing the key factors affecting the leverage ratio.'}]}, {'name': 'FinancialData.predict_future_leverage', 'description': 'Predict the future leverage ratio trend for the next year.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'key_factors', 'type': 'LIST', 'description': 'The key factors obtained from the previous step.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'future_leverage_trend', 'description': 'A dictionary containing the predicted leverage ratio trend for the next year.'}]}, {'name': 'FinancialData.provide_management_advice', 'description': 'Provide management advice based on the AI analysis of leverage ratio.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'future_leverage_trend', 'type': 'DICT', 'description': 'The predicted leverage ratio trend obtained from the previous step.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'management_advice', 'description': 'A list of recommendations for managing the leverage ratio.'}]}]
如果你已经知道答案，请调用FinishAction来提供最终的回复。
我需要评估人工智能技术在杠杆率管理中的应用。首先，获取Bank of America过去五年的杠杆率数据。然后，使用人工智能算法分析杠杆率的关键因素。接着，预测未来一年的杠杆率趋势。最后，提供基于人工智能的杠杆率管理建议。当前这一步的目标是什么?
获取Bank of America过去五年的杠杆率数据。
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
当前工具的参数'bank_name'的值是什么?
